entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WaitForExitAsync hangs and leads to zombies process are created (Linux) #114847
  • MemoryMappedFile is up to ~1000x slower than Java for single-byte reads #114846
  • Source Build Validation legs are failing #114842
  • [mono] Cannot transition thread 0000000000001B78 from RUNNING with DONE_BLOCKING #114840

Closed

  • How to get current process invocation name (argv[0]/$0)? (login shell on *nix) #30212
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: union #114844
  • QNX? Does anyone know of any resources for getting .NET Core compiled/running on it? #11839
  • [API Proposal]: Add Task.TryDelay #114838
  • Assert failure(PID 14524 [0x000038bc], Thread: 3292 [0xcdc]): !AreShadowStacksEnabled() || UseSpecialUserModeApc() #114815
  • It's possible to change the string object in a safe context. #114834
  • Process.Start with RedirectStandardOutput fails with System.PlatformNotSupportedException in .NET 9 #113450

PullRequests

Created

  • [Profiler][Tests] Add shutdown guard and filter to classload test #114849
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix side effect handling for certain TernaryLogic cases #114848
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fold "new T[size].Length" into "size" #114845
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove gitter from readme #114841
    area-Meta
  • Improve error message when running on outdated Windows OS with incomplete CET support #114839
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix typing of BlendVariableMask condition when optimizing TernaryLogic #114837
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Don't optimize prologues/epilogues in OptimizePostIndexed #114843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Share implementation of ComWrappers between CoreCLR and NativeAOT #113907
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Add bootstrapping build mechanism and enable for SourceBuild #114285
    source-build, area-Infrastructure
  • [RuntimeAsync] Merge from labs, all except JIT #114675
    area-VM-coreclr, runtime-coreclr, runtime-async
  • Draft PR to add additional 8 eGPR #114593
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Speed up floating to integer casts on x86/x64 #114410
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Abolish PSPSym from ABI #114630
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Convert genRuntimeEventSources to a C# source generator #114810
    needs-area-label
  • Make specifying just `DllImportSearchPath.AssemblyDirectory` only search in assembly directory #114756
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [LoongArch64] Improve the functionality of LoongArch64 R2R #114666
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [Android] Run CoreCLR library tests on Android #114148
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-android, 10.0.0
  • Fix the amd64 cross-DAC stack unwinding #114836
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: don't mark callees noinline for non-fatal observations with pgo #114821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add custom exception handlers to generated COM wrappers #114828
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Fix some bugs to make NativeAOT stable. #114618
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • Add Decimal32, Decimal64, Decimal128 #100729
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [cdac] Create transport package and rename the cdac reader #114812
    needs-area-label
